title: TCV Builds $4 Billion Fund With Help From Main Street
sub_head: The technology-focused firm revisits its early days to raise its latest fund
body:
Growth investor TCV returned to its roots as Technology Crossover Ventures to raise its latest flagship vehicle, a $4 billion fund that includes commitments from hundreds of individual investors along with institutions such as public pensions.
The Menlo Park, Calif., private-equity firm wrapped up its biggest ever growth-equity fund, TCV XI LP, with a feeder vehicle attracting commitments of more than $221.5 million from more than 830 investors through the end of last November, a regulatory filing shows. TCV focuses on backing...
